name: Insomnia (itch) (BoxedVodka-bot)
description:
INSOMNIA is a collaborative project designed and developed by seven NYU students for the 2021 Global Game Jam.

Press A and D to walk. Press SPACE to jump.

Script Writing: Shijie Xing
Comceptual arit & Illustration: Mingxuan Cao
Sprite Animations: Anzhi Li
Enviornmental Arts: Kerby Neo
Sound and Music: Ziwen Zhang
Level Design: Yibing Chen
Development: Yibing Chen & Hongke Luo
Director: Hongke Luo
